Articles.Content: my wild guess would be that you need to have tracking station and admin building upgraded to have patched conics available, i think without that some options (maneuver planner and such) aren't available.
Hm, I have all buildings upgraded to max, still nothing, might there be some other tech I require to use mechjeb?
Try removing the whole MechJebLocalSettings node from your config and try again.

Cheers, now it works!

On a mechjeb related problem. Mechjeb has a bit of a mind of its own. It decides to steer my rockets straight down, even actively aims downwards, any ideas on what's up with that, to low liftforce?
